entry.title: My blog is also its own RSS feed

content.div: On the main page of this blog (which lists all posts), right-click an empty place and select "View Page Source (Ctrl+U)". What do you see? An RSS feed! (or, rather, it's technically an Atom feed, but who actually cares) But how? And... Why?!..
